name: Rescue Team 3
description: Save the day as the leader of the Rescue Team, a group of life-saving pros trained to swoop in and sweep up in the wake of a natural disaster! Figure out the quickest way to complete your goals, make good use your resources and unlock every achievement.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Video 64 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 55 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 55 MB available space
